meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beyond the moon.
meanings.sent1: The astronauts discovered a superlunar object during their space mission.
meanings.sent2: The telescope captured a superlunar phenomenon in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The alien claimed to have a superlunar origin, making the scientists chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as superlunar as the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The superlunar view from the observatory left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the region beyond the moon.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study superlunar phenomena to understand outer space better.
meanings.sent2: The superlunar exploration mission aimed to uncover mysteries beyond our moon.
meanings.sent3: The superlunar conference brought together experts from various planets.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were as superlunar as the galaxies beyond our reach.
meanings.sent5: The superlunar landscape in the painting transported viewers to distant worlds.

meanings.definition: Transcending the moon in greatness or excellence.
meanings.sent1: The superlunar achievements of the young scientist amazed the entire scientific community.
meanings.sent2: The superlunar performance of the orchestra received a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The superlunar dessert at the restaurant was so delicious that it seemed out of this world.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence was as superlunar as the brightest stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The superlunar talent of the artist shone through in every brushstroke.
